title: Can't log on
body: I was playing league of Legends game then after the game ended I couldn't create another game so I checked my internet connection and it was fine, hence how I am posting now and the message "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline." I've tried playing the MMORPG KRITIKA and it works fine. Not sure what to do. Anyone having this problem?

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  It looks like there was a small hiccup with login service, but should be fine now!
